    • Method Detail

      • loginButton

        public void loginButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Checks inputs for password and login against all authorized Users in database. If failed, writes to Login Text file and displays Error message If succeeds, writes to Login Text file and creates Customer list and Appointments list and passes them to the MainUI Controller
        Parameters:
        event - login Button pushed

      • exitButtonPushed

        public void exitButtonPushed()
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Exits program and closes database connection
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws Exception

      • populateCustomerList

        private void populateCustomerList()
        Builds Customer objects from database information and add items to Customer List

      • populateAppointmentsList

        private void populateAppointmentsList()
        Builds Appointment Objects from database and populates Appointments List

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Establishes connection to the database, Displays users timezone and Country, sets Language base on user's language (English or French)
